sentences.english: Apply solution to the tube and allow to become tacky .
sentences.chinese: 在内胎上涂抹胶水并让它发粘。

sentences.english: A safety liner for protecting the tubeless tires is provided.
sentences.chinese: 为保护无内胎轮胎的安全班轮提供。

sentences.english: A design of SUV tubeless radial tire is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍SUV型无内胎子午线轮胎的设计。

sentences.english: Care must be exercised to avoid damaging the tire bead or inner tube.
sentences.chinese: 要当心不要损坏轮胎轮缘或内胎。

sentences.english: The tire is a tubeless type, so it is very stiff.
sentences.chinese: 轮胎是一个无内胎型，因此它是非常激烈的。

sentences.english: This is a close-up showing the use of the inner tube.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个展示内胎使用方法的特写镜头。

sentences.english: Calendar fabric, beads, belts, inner tubes & batch stock.
sentences.chinese: 日用纺织品，珠，皮带，内胎及批量原料。

sentences.english: In developed countries, almost all tubeless tire made of butyl rubber.
sentences.chinese: 在发达国家，轮胎内胎几乎已全部由丁基橡胶制成。

sentences.english: The tires of the trucks are flat. The inner tubes might be punctured.
sentences.chinese: 卡车轮胎瘪了，内胎可能被刺穿。

sentences.english: Butyl tube is a kind of upgrade products of tubes, but with high cost.
sentences.chinese: 丁基内胎是内胎的升级换代产品，但丁基胶价格昂贵。

sentences.english: Butyl tube is a kind of upgrade products of tubes, but with high cost.
sentences.chinese: 丁基内胎是内胎的升级换代产品，但丁基胶价格昂贵。

sentences.english: The advised tire pressure for tubeless tires is between 30 and 40 psi.
sentences.chinese: 该建议的无内胎轮胎压力轮胎是30至40磅。

sentences.english: Tire tube is an important component of tire.
sentences.chinese: 内胎是轮胎的重要部件之一。

sentences.english: Reach through the bottom half of the inner tube and grab the top half.
sentences.chinese: 从低下的一半内胎穿过并抓住上面一半。

sentences.english: I found a tinny hole in the inner tube of my bike .
sentences.chinese: 我发现我的自行车内胎有个小洞。

sentences.english: Maxxis ultralight tubes are the standard in performance inner tubes for racing and training.
sentences.chinese: 玛吉斯超轻内胎是用于比赛和培训的标准性能内胎。

definition: to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
